### ERROR TIPS
- **Mining drill not working**: The mining drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) is not functioning. Ensure the drill has sufficient fuel and is placed on a valid resource patch. Verify that the drill is connected to a power source if it is an electric drill.

### NAMESPACE
